svg.text: 1. Source Code → Tokenization → AST → Bytecode → Machine Code
2. Optimization: Inline Caching, Hidden Classes, JIT Compilation
const fetchData = async (url) => await fetch(url).then(res => res.json());
Code Splitting, Tree Shaking, Minification, Bundle Analysis
Lazy Loading, Memoization, Virtual DOM, Service Workers
Breakpoints, Call Stack, Watch Variables, Console Logging, Network Monitoring
Source Maps, Performance Profiling, Memory Analysis, Error Tracking
Source Code → Tokenizer → Parser → AST → Bytecode → Optimized Machine Code
Call Stack → Execution Context → Memory Allocation → Garbage Collection
Event Loop → Web APIs → Task Queue → Microtask Queue → Callback Execution
Write Code → Lint/Format → Bundle/Transpile → Test → Debug → Deploy
